channel.title: Adding a new shop that takes tickets![DELTA]

item.title: Adding a new shop that takes tickets![DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

I started adding this shop and thought I did everything right but then in game it comes saying “currently cost “number” tokens” and right under that is says “currently cost “number” coins”…how do I fix this? This is the only shop I think does it since in the code under this shows 2 shops the second shop is not in game…“MyShopID == 34” is the shop I’m trying to fix…here is the code

if (MyShopID == 8 || MyShopID == 34) { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" tokens"+ShopAdd); } if ( MyShopID == 35 || MyShopID == 19 || MyShopID == 18 || MyShopID == 1) { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" points"+ShopAdd); } else { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" coins"+ShopAdd); }
how do I fix this?

Read full topic
item.source: Adding a new shop that takes tickets![DELTA]
